Data Analyst, Developer, IT Manager

Data Analyst (PIM) at Newell Brands.

Previous Back End Developer/Data Engineer for Newell Brands, Front End Developer for Jack Henry and HCA Healthcare, IT Manager for Juel Salon and Trew Audio, Multimedia Developer for Digital Divestment and Duthie Associates.
